summary: Request to add EnumType support by default for PHP 8.1 and later versions. This would leverage PHP 8.1's native enum feature to improve type safety in the SDK.
userImpact: Users on PHP 8.1+ would benefit from native enum type support, providing better type safety and IDE support.
proposedFix: Add EnumType support for PHP >=8.1 by default in the SDK
resolutionDetails: EnumType support was added for PHP 8.1+
keyQuote: I think we should add the `EnumType` by default for PHP >=8.1
